page.title: 11Crime in the Doomsday Area
page.content: As in other parts of London there is a great deal of crime in Wimbledon. For example there was the incident of a middle aged lady being raped in her own car. The woman, aged 37,was followed along Plough Lane and grabbed from behind and then pushed into the back seat of her car.Other incidents include bag snatchers who struck on a motorbike in Hampton Close and grabbed a woman's bag.In Garfield Road there was a fire which children playing with matches are said to have started.Street lights were smashed in Plough Lane by vandals who caused 600 pounds worth of damage. This may also have been the work of children.
